org.springframework.context.expression

类 BeanFactoryResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.context.expression.BeanFactoryResolver
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.expression.BeanResolver

    public class BeanFactoryResolver
extends Object
implements org.springframework.expression.BeanResolver
    EL bean resolver that operates against a Spring BeanFactory.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.0.4

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      BeanFactoryResolver(BeanFactory beanFactory)
      Create a new BeanFactoryResolver for the given factory.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Object resolve(org.springframework.expression.EvaluationContext context, String beanName)
      Look up a bean by the given name and return a corresponding instance for it.

      • BeanFactoryResolver

        public BeanFactoryResolver(BeanFactory beanFactory)
        Create a new BeanFactoryResolver for the given factory.
        参数:
        beanFactory - the BeanFactory to resolve bean names against

    • 方法详细资料

      • resolve

        public Object resolve(org.springframework.expression.EvaluationContext context,
                      String beanName)
               throws org.springframework.expression.AccessException
        从接口复制的说明: org.springframework.expression.BeanResolver
        Look up a bean by the given name and return a corresponding instance for it. For attempting access to a factory bean, the name needs a & prefix.
        指定者:
        resolve 在接口中 org.springframework.expression.BeanResolver
        参数:
        context - the current evaluation context
        beanName - the name of the bean to look up
        返回:
        an object representing the bean
        抛出:
        org.springframework.expression.AccessException - if there is an unexpected problem resolving the bean
